thread.title: Gretchen Michele Dowd
thread.title_full: American Frame americanframe.com reviewed by Gretchen Michele Dowd

author: Gretchen Michele Dowd
title: Gretchen Michele Dowd
text: I've been buying frames and mats from American Frame for several years and the product and service has been exceptional! On a recent order I ordered a reverse cut on my mat in error. When I called about it Customer Service explained what I did but sent me a replacement mat at no charge. This type of service keeps me coming back! I recommend them highly for their Committment to their customers and their great products!
